accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

scopecontent.p: Play written and directed by Barbara Kahn, performed at theTheater for the New City from March 17 through April 3, 2011. Included one CD of photographs (removed to 6317/011 AV).

did.unittitle: Remember the Triangle Fire Coalition Press Kit

scopecontent.p: Literature for 11 Triangle Fire Commemoration events and 2 books. Includes blank registration form to join the Remember the Triangle Fire Coalition

Featuring Birds on Fire; Fabric, Flames, and Fervor; Susan Harris: Remembering Their Prayers; Images of America: The New York City Triangle Factory Fire; Remember the Triangle Fire Coalition; and the Centennial Commemoration Workers United.
Presented by First Class on March 14, 2011
Cards and stickers. Front of cards have an inspirational quote, sheet of ten cards. The stickers each contain the name and age of a victim, sheet of 80 stickers. For assembled cards see 6317/001 MB.
